doc.title: Reflection
doc.plot: 11 short documentary films - portraits of inhabitants of two small towns: GÃ³ra Kalwaria in Poland and Remscheid-Lennep in Germany. The authors of these films are students of two partner schools: the Andrzej Wajda Master School of Film Directing and the International Film School in Cologne (Internationale Filmschule Koeln).The films were made under artistic supervision of Polish and German tutors: Jacek BÅ‚awut, Marcel Å�oziÅ„ski, Katarzyna Maciejko-Kowalczyk and Sylke Rene Meyer.
